message.body: Hey, I'll probably get to the Terra building around 10:20 tomorrow because of how the trains time out. Or, I might just drive instead. Regardless, I'll see you between 10-10:30. Thanks.
Not a problem! I'll see you tomorrow!
Dan! They are giving me a different room so text when you are close and I'll let you know what floor and room I'm in.
Cool. I'm walking from a parking lot now.
great Iâ€™m on the 11th floor in 1114. You can just knock on the door
Fortunately, I did not forget my license at the front desk.

Also, I figure there's no harm in asking, but are they willing to cover parking and/or mileage. Parking was $20 (I have a receipt. Mileage was 24; at $0.56/mile, that would be $13.44. I can eat these costs, but again, figured I might as well ask.
Oh good cause I totally forgot to remind you! Let me run it by Bev and I'll let you know!
